page.title: 12The Fox Public House
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.Chamberlain are the landlords of this pub which has been here for 200 years.There is a pond outside for children as they are not allowed in the pub.Inside the pub there is a juke box and fruit machine, a pool table and a darts board. Mr. and Mrs.Chamberlain have 14 different kinds of beer, and the most popular is IPA.They also sell Guinness,cider, bitter and lager.He also sells nuts, crisps, scampi fries and crackle nuts. They serve food at lunch-times and in the evenings.The pub is open from 11am till 2pm and from 6pm. till 11pm. Greene King Brewery own the pub, and the Chamberlains are tenants.Three people work here during the week, and four or five at week-ends.Their busiest day is Sunday.
